channel.title: Small problem, help?
channel.description: Alright so im using Deathlypvpz v4 as a base, heavily cleaned & remade, except a few minor things, so i would like to remove loyalty points, i have removed the shops, points from playersave, now i need to remove the announcement it gives every hour, it says you will be given "loyalty points" in 1 hour, my question is where do i find this ? to remove it from announcing.

item.title: Small problem, help?
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

i would just use a windows search in the server directory but im lazy that a way lol.

“Search in file contents” needs to be enabled but finds it for you.

Read full topic

@bob2568 wrote:

bump. i have another problem.

item.title: Small problem, help?
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

If you could leave a copy of the question and answer it would help future users who have the same or similar problems.

Subject: problem here[Solved]
a copy of the answer in the original post helps alot too (so users don’t have to scroll through the comments)

Read full topic
